name: Renew Arena
description:
This game was made in 7 days for the 7DFPS jam as well as ProcJam (2020)!  It's built in Unity with inspiration from Quake and a focus on moving around a randomly generated arena, while fighting enemies. To beat each level, you must repair all of the transparent blocks to make them solid again.  

There is no end-game at the moment, but each level will increase in size (adding more enemies, etc.)  This was really fun to work on, I'd love to actually make more enemies, improve level generation, and add more features and polish! Let me know what you think!

Big thanks to Stennish (https://soundcloud.com/autistgamer1337/sets/chiptunes) for the background music, which they posted to reddit recently and released under the CC-BY license!

(P.S. the yellow blocks with arrows give you a double jump, I forgot to add any sort of in-game notification or explanation for them!)
